post.body: I explored Trin it is def. photoworthy. After 5 yrs @ UofT, I've stepped inside this building only once! It's like Hogwarts...
Roaming around the city yesterday, I didn't realize how many nooks I have not explored. And Jen, we should totally shoot Trinity.
I actually wrote that in a fit of passionate anger. I still prefer Macs, but I'll keep my PC as a back-up. ;-)
The Twilight craze.
*shudder* : http://tinyurl.com/9bcgtj
Canon! I shoot with a 40D DSLR and an A-1 film SLR :-)
My art books, esp. monographs of Joseph Cornell, Louise Bourgeois, & Francesca Woodman; my hard drives; my etchings.
Oh Jen, you totally dazzle me regardless LOL!
Are you serious?! Good God, this extreme fanaticism has got to stop. The horror! (I wonder if the shimmer makes twinkly sounds.)
Currrently addicted to the Milk Oolong and Dragon Tears. Evidently, I have expensive taste when it comes to tea.
I pretty much have a love/hate relationship with TO, but sites like these make me smile: http://ifeeltoronto.com/
I am so very done with PC's. PC's suck. Consider me a Mac girl, even if I technically still operate on a PC laptop. Ugh, yuck.
'Twas a good day, albeit windy: the AGO, Sushi Time on Queen, and Benjamin Button. 'Bawled my eyes out on the latter.
Getting rid of almost all of my clothes and reverting to baggier threads seems to be an annual thing for me...
http://tinyurl.com/6c8mbk - note-worthy.
Finally went to bed at 6am. Woke up with the wind violently rattling my bedroom windows at 10am.
http://www.isshamarie.com - And damn it, my site, and my CV, needs some serious updating.
http://isshamarie.wordpress.com/ - I wish I had the skills and the time to really customize my blog and make it my own.
On a lighter note - off to the AGO and some failboat skating later today with the best friend (and her boyfriend).
Doing some late-night thinking, reevaluating my priorities. 'Realized that my life feels extremely empty without any sort of art-making.
